question: Liverpool vs. Everton
description:
In the upcoming EPL game, scheduled for October 21, 7:30 AM ET: 

If Liverpool wins, this market will resolve to "LIV". If Everton wins or the game is a draw, this market will resolve to "EVE / Draw". 

If the game is not completed by October 28, 2023 (11:59 PM ET), the market will resolve to 50-50

events.title: EPL
events.description: This is a market group for EPL games happening on 2023-10-21

question: Saudi Aramco's 2023 net income >$120 billion?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Saudi Aramco's reported net income for the fiscal year 2023 is greater than $120 billion. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official annual earnings report released by Saudi Aramco. Any revisions made to the reported net income after the initial official release will not impact the outcome of this market. 

This market is based on Aramco's net income, not any other financial metric.

If no official 2023 fiscal year earnings report is released by July 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Saudi Arabia non-oil GDP % up in Q3?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas accounts for less than 25.0% of Saudi Arabia's GDP in Q3 of 2023. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the General Authority for Statistics (https://www.stats.gov.sa/en/823), specifically the percentage in the pie chart in their Q3 report. 

If no information is released by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Saudi Arabia non-oil GDP % up in Q3?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas accounts for less than 25.0% of Saudi Arabia's GDP in Q3 of 2023. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the General Authority for Statistics (https://www.stats.gov.sa/en/823), specifically the percentage in the pie chart in their Q3 report. 

If no information is released by June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Venezuela oil production >1 million barrels/day by Q1 2024?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the average daily oil production in Venezuela exceeds 1 million barrels per day in either Q4 2023 or Q1 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

The values considered will be the barrels/day for both Q4 2023 and Q1 2024. If either of these exceed 1 million barrels per day, this market will resolve to "Yes." Otherwise this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be direct communication data provided by OPEC, 
(e.g. https://www.opec.org/opec_web/en/publications/338.htm + https://www.opec.org/opec_web/static_files_project/media/downloads/publications/Addendum_October%20MOMR.pdf). Any revisions made to the reported oil production after the initial data release will not impact the outcome of this market. 

Another credible source will be chosen if OPEC releases do not become available.

events.title: Venezuela oil production >1 million barrels/day by Q1 2024?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the average daily oil production in Venezuela exceeds 1 million barrels per day in either Q4 2023 or Q1 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". 

The values considered will be the barrels/day for both Q4 2023 and Q1 2024. If either of these exceed 1 million barrels per day, this market will resolve to "Yes." Otherwise this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market will be direct communication data provided by OPEC, 
(e.g. https://www.opec.org/opec_web/en/publications/338.htm + https://www.opec.org/opec_web/static_files_project/media/downloads/publications/Addendum_October%20MOMR.pdf). Any revisions made to the reported oil production after the initial data release will not impact the outcome of this market. 

Another credible source will be chosen if OPEC releases do not become available.

question: Will Rafah border crossing open for humanitarian aid by Sunday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt opens for humanitarian aid between October 20 and October 22, 11:59 PM PDT (Palestine Daylight Time, UTC + 3). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the governments of Egypt and the United States, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

events.title: Will Rafah border crossing open for humanitarian aid by Sunday?

question: ETH above $1,600 on Halloween?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Coinbase 1 minute candle for ETH-USD 31 Oct '23 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) has a final Close price of 1600.01 or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is https://www.coinbase.com/, specifically the ETH-USD "Close" prices currently available at https://www.coinbase.com/advanced-trade/ETH-USD with 1m and Candles selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Coinbase ETH-USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the official annual earnings report released by Saudi Aramco. Any revisions made to the reported net income after the initial official release will not impact the outcome of this market.

question: Will Israel launch a major ground offensive in Gaza by Sunday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if, by October 22, 2023, 11:59 PM ET, Israel initiates a major ground offensive in Gaza. A "major ground offensive" is defined as a large-scale military operation that involves greater than 1000 Israeli ground forces, and does not include smaller raids or special operations. The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

The market will resolve to "No" if no such major ground offensive takes place in Gaza by the Israeli forces by October 22. If the event occurs before the expiry date, the market will resolve immediately.
